title: The Village of Jodicus
description: "The Village of Jodicus" is a fiction novel surrounding the events of Jesus. The author humanizes the centurion that stabbed Jesus while He was on the cross . The story is told through chapter headings with different characters' scenarios and the year that they occurred. The characters seem separate at first but it is proven that they are interwoven. This book will appeal to readers who enjoy creative fiction.
author: J.R. Sweeney
